Package game.skills

Class Skills

java.lang.Object
game.skills.Skills
Direct Known Subclasses:
Quickstep, SlamAttack, SpinAttack, Unsheathe
public abstract class Skills extends Object
An abstract class that represents all Skills that can be used by an Actor. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:, Po Han Tay

  • Constructor Details

    • Skills

      public Skills(String name, int damage, int accuracy, String verb)
      Skills Constructor. Sets the damage, accuracy and verb for the skill.
      Parameters:
      name - : The name of the Skill.
      damage - : The damage dealt to the target Actor.
      accuracy - : The accuracy chance of the Skill attack.
      verb - : The verb action when using the Skill attack.

      A method to return the accuracy data attribute.
